traceability.evidence: - test/cli.invalid-options.test.js: 5 tests covering unknown options, suggestions, invalid values, multiple errors all pass (exit code 2, correct stderr messages). - src/cli-options.js: unknownArgs logic detects invalid flags, prints `Error: Unknown option '...'`, suggestions, and help hint, then `process.exit(2)`. - src/cli-options-helpers/parse-string-flag.js & parse-integer-flag.js: validate option values and exit with code 2 on invalid values, printing `Invalid format: yaml. Valid values are: table, json, xml`. - console.error used throughout for error output (stderr).
traceability.notes: All acceptance criteria for invalid option error handling are implemented and verified by concrete tests. Unknown options are detected, clear error messages with suggestions are shown, exit code 2 is used, help is suggested, and invalid values are validated. No silent failures and error output goes to stderr.
